name: P.U.N.K. JAM Extreme Session
effectText: Once per turn: You can banish 1 "P.U.N.K." card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "P.U.N.K." monster from your hand. If a Psychic monster you control paid LP to activate its effect: You can draw 1 card. You can use this effect of "P.U.N.K. JAM Extreme Session" up to twice per turn.
